details {
  position: relative; }
  details.form-item {
    margin: 0 1rem; }
    details.form-item summary {
      padding: 1rem 2rem 0 0; }
  details summary::-webkit-details-marker {
    display: none; }
  details summary {
    max-width: 400px;
    margin: auto;
    color: #404040;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: flex;
    font-size: 1.05rem;
    padding: 1rem 0 0 0;
    padding-right: 1rem;
    position: relative;
    text-decoration: none;
    outline: none; }
    details summary:after {
      display: inline-block;
      font-family: "ccl-icons";
      -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
      -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
      font-style: normal;
      font-variant: normal;
      font-weight: 900;
      line-height: 1;
      margin-left: 0.2222222222rem;
      margin-top: 0.1666666667rem;
      speak: none;
      text-decoration: none;
      text-transform: none;
      margin-left: 0.66rem;
      position: absolute;
      right: 0;
      -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in-out;
      transition: all .3s ease-in-out; }
    details summary[aria-expanded='false']::after {
      content: '\e914'; }
    details summary[aria-expanded='true']::after {
      content: '\e911'; }
  details .form-checkboxes {
    max-width: 400px;
    margin: 1rem auto;
    max-height: 150px;
    overflow-y: scroll;
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 10001;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid #273B4B; }
    details .form-checkboxes label {
      margin-bottom: 0; }
    details .form-checkboxes .form-check-input + .form-check-label::after,
    details .form-checkboxes .form-check-input + label::after,
    details .form-checkboxes .repo-table .repo-table-row .form-check-input + span.label::after {
      content: ' ';
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      top: 0.1666666667rem;
      background: 0 0;
      width: 1rem;
      height: 1rem;
      border: 1px solid #404040 !important;
      border-radius: 2px; }
    details .form-checkboxes .form-check-input:checked + .form-check-label:before,
    details .form-checkboxes .form-check-input:checked + label:before,
    details .form-checkboxes .repo-table .repo-table-row .form-check-input:checked + span.label:before {
      content: '';
      display: block;
      width: 0.2777777778rem;
      left: 0.3888888889rem;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0.1666666667rem;
      right: -1.1666666667rem;
      height: 0.7222222222rem;
      border: solid;
      border-width: 0 2px 2px 0;
      -webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
      transform: rotate(45deg);
      border-color: #273B4B; }

  background: rgba(105, 170, 220, 0.06);
  border: none; }
  .list-collapse .card .card-header &gt; a {
    border-left: 4px solid transparent;
    transition: 0.3s ease-out; }
    .list-collapse .card .card-header &gt; a:hover {
      border-color: #273B4B; }
  .list-collapse .card .card-header a {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    vertical-align: middle;
    padding: 1rem 0 1rem 1rem;
    color: #273B4B; }
.list-collapse .card.active .card-header &gt; a {
  margin: 0;
  display: block; }
  .list-collapse .card.active .card-header &gt; a.active {
    position: relative;
    font-weight: bold; }
.list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body {
  padding: 0 1.25rem; }
  .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body a {
    position: relative;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-out;
    margin: 0;
    display: block; }
    .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body a:before {
      content: "";
      left: 0;
      top: calc( 50% - 5px);
      border-style: solid;
      border-width: 5px 10px 5px 0;
      border-color: transparent #FFF transparent;
      position: absolute;
      transform: rotate(180deg);
      opacity: 0;
      transition: all 0.3s ease-out; }
    .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body a:hover:before {
      opacity: 1; }
  .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; div &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; li &gt; a,
  .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; div &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; a,
  .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; li &gt; a,
  .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; a {
    font-weight: bold; }
    .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; div &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; li &gt; a:before,
    .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; div &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; a:before,
    .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; li &gt; a:before,
    .list-collapse .card.active .card-header .card-body &gt; ul &gt; .active &gt; span &gt; a:before {
      opacity: 1; }

  min-height: 100vh;
  background-color: rgba(39, 59, 75, 0.7); }
  @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    #sliding-popup.js-enabled {
      top: 0; } }
  #sliding-popup.js-enabled .eu-cookie-compliance-banner {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    max-height: 60vh;
    margin-top: 20vh; }
    @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
      #sliding-popup.js-enabled .eu-cookie-compliance-banner {
        max-height: 80vh;
        margin-top: 10vh; } }
    #sliding-popup.js-enabled .eu-cookie-compliance-banner .popup-content {
      max-width: 675px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      background: #273B4B;
      padding: 40px;
      width: 100%; }
      @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

          max-width: 80%;
          padding: 15px; } }

        font-size: 22px; }
        @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

          transform: scale(1.5);

              margin-right: inherit; } }

  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  -webkit-transition: all ease 500ms;
  -moz-transition: all ease 500ms;
  -o-transition: all ease 500ms;
  -ms-transition: all ease 500ms;
  transition: all ease 500ms;
  padding: 0; }
  @media (min-width: 336px) and (max-width: 710px) {
    #service-hex {
      max-width: 400px; } }
  @media (min-width: 711px) and (max-width: 1399px) {
    #service-hex {
      max-width: 700px;
      margin: 0 auto; } }

    color: #b8b8b9;
    margin-top: -30px;
    font-size: 0.8rem; }

    width: 120px;
    height: 200px;
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block; }
    #service-hex .service_item .hexagon2 {
      position: absolute;
      width: 120px;
      height: 200px;
      top: -10px; }

      overflow: hidden;
      visibility: hidden;
      -webkit-transform: rotate(120deg);
      -moz-transform: rotate(120deg);
      -o-transform: rotate(120deg);
      -ms-transform: rotate(120deg);
      transform: rotate(120deg);
      cursor: pointer; }

        overflow: hidden;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;

        -ms-transform: rotate(-60deg);
        transform: rotate(-60deg); }

          overflow: hidden;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          visibility: visible;
          -webkit-transform: rotate(-60deg);
          -moz-transform: rotate(-60deg);
          -o-transform: rotate(-60deg);
          -ms-transform: rotate(-60deg);
          transform: rotate(-60deg);
